description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Terwilliger is the neighborhood mouse catcher. He catches mice and shows the neighbors his good deeds. Some people in the neighborhood appreciate his efforts... but some do not! How many mice can you help Terwilliger catch?
